name: Damsel
description: A young woman's marriage turns into a survival fight against a dragon.
recommendationDescription: Even a giant talking dragon can’t save this feminist fantasy survival thriller.

name: Uglies
description: In a world obsessed with beauty, one girl rebels against the system.
recommendationDescription: A sleek dystopian tale with a rebellious heart.

name: The Six Triple Eight
description: Black women in WWII defy odds in the 6888th Postal Battalion.
recommendationDescription: An inspiring tribute to unsung heroes.

name: Queen of Tears
description: A couple faces a marital crisis with love and tears.
recommendationDescription: True to its name, it’ll have you tearing up quite a bit.

name: King the Land
description: A hotel heir and employee find love amid chaos.
recommendationDescription: A charming rom-com with a feel-good vibe.

name: Doctor Slump
description: Two rival doctors hit rock bottom and heal together.
